name: audioop-lts
raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: audioop-lts
  version: "0.2.2"

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/${{ name[0] }}/${{ name }}/audioop_lts-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 64d0c62d88e67b98a1a5e71987b7aa7b5bcffc7dcee65b635823dbdd0a8dbbd0

build:
  number: 1
  script:
    - if: match(python, ">=3.13")
      then: ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ stdlib('c') }}
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - python
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
  host:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - pip
  run:
    - python

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - audioop
  - requirements:
      run:
        - pip
    script:
      - pip check
      - python -c "import audioop; assert list(audioop.reverse(bytes([1,2,4,8]), 2)) == [4, 8, 1, 2]"

about:
  summary: LTS Port of Python audioop
  license: EPL-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  homepage: https://github.com/AbstractUmbra/audioop

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bmcfee
    - IzerOnadimQC
    - xhochy
